citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2pm, on 28-July-
2023. The inspector called and texted the phone number listed and waited 30 min.
The licensee called within 2 hours to discuss hours of operation for future inspections.
This is the first attempted inspection
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2pm, on 28-July-
2023. The inspector called and texted the phone number listed and waited 30 min.  
 
The licensee called within 2 hours to discuss hours of operation for future inspections. 
 
This is the first attempted inspection 
 
 
End Section
